chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m2 m3 -> lemd d (map_or m0 m2) (map_or m1 m3)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
map_or = fix map_or (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Map bool := match m0 with | @M0 _ => M0 bool | @M1 _ a0 b0 => match m1 with | @M1 _ a1 b1 => if (a0 =? a1)%N then M1 bool a0 (b0 || b1) else M0 bool | _ => M0 bool end | @M2 _ x0 y0 => match m1 with | @M2 _ x1 y1 => M2 bool (map_or x0 x1) (map_or y0 y1) | _ => M0 bool end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Map bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
lemd_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m2 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m1 m2 -> lemd d m0 m2
map_or_inc_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_or m0 m) (map_or m1 m)
map_or_inc_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_or m m0) (map_or m m1)
lemd_antisymmetric : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m1 m0 -> m0 = m1
map_or_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> ensemble_base state d (map_or m0 m1)
domain_equal_transitive : forall (A0 A1 A2 : Set) (m0 : Map A0) (m1 : Map A1) (m2 : Map A2), domain_equal A0 A1 m0 m1 -> domain_equal A1 A2 m1 m2 -> domain_equal A0 A2 m0 m2
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
map_or_def_ok : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 (map_or m0 m1)

map_or_mapget_true_inv : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true \/ MapGet bool m1 a = Some true
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
domain_equal_symmetric : forall (A B : Set) (m0 : Map A) (m1 : Map B), domain_equal A B m0 m1 -> domain_equal B A m1 m0
lemd_reflexive : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m m
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m0) (H1 :...
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0...
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
pl_coacc = fix pl_coacc (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) {struct pl} : Map bool := match pl with | prec_cons a la ls => map_replace bool (map_or (pl_coacc d la) (pl_coacc d ls)) a true | prec_empty => map_mini state d end : preDTA -> prec_list -> Map bool
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
predta_coacc_0_def_ok : forall (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m)
predta_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc d a m)
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool m a = Some b -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) a = Some true
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
coacc_transitive_def = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => forall a2 : ad, coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a2 a0 -> coacc d a2 a1 : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d

``` 
intros d m0 m1 m2 m3 H1 H2. 
unfold lemd, ensemble_base, lem in *. 
destruct H1 as [H11 [H12 H13]]. 
destruct H2 as [H21 [H22 H23]]. 
split; [|split]. 
- apply map_or_inc_ld with (m:=m2); assumption. 
- apply map_or_inc_rd with (m:=m3); assumption. 
- apply lemd_transitive with (m1:=m1); assumption. 
```

original: intros d m0 m1 m2 m3 H1 H2. unfold lemd, ensemble_base, lem in *. destruct H1 as [H11 [H12 H13]]. destruct H2 as [H21 [H22 H23]]. split; [|split]. - apply map_or_inc_ld with (m:=m2); auto. - apply map_or_inc_rd with (m:=m3); auto. - apply lemd_transitive with (m1:=m1); auto.
